data.lore: ��The bigger the risk, the bigger the bounty.�� Beauty and danger: There are few who can match Miss Fortune in either. One of Bilgewater's most infamous bounty hunters, she built her legend upon a swathe of bullet-riddled corpses and captured ne�er-do-wells. The booming echoes of her twin pistols in the port city�s reeking wharfs and scavenger shanties are sure signs of another warrant from the Bounty Board being settled.
data.name: Miss Fortune
data.title: the Bounty Hunter

spells.tooltip:
Miss Fortune fires a shot through an enemy to hit another enemy behind them, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to the first target and {{ e4 }} (+{{ f2 }}) (+{{ a2 }}) physical damage to the second.

If the first target is killed, the second hit will deal 150% damage instead.
spells.description: Miss Fortune fires a bullet at an enemy, damaging them and a target behind them.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Miss Fortune fires a shot through an enemy to hit another enemy behind them, dealing {{ e2 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage to the first target and {{ e4 }} (+{{ f2 }}) (+{{ a2 }}) physical damage to the second. If the first target is killed, the second hit will deal 150% damage instead.
spells.name: Double Up
spells.sanitizedDescription: Miss Fortune fires a bullet at an enemy, damaging them and a target behind them.

spells.tooltip:
Passive: Basic attacks deal {{ f1 }} bonus magic damage, stacking cumulatively up to {{ f3 }} times for a maximum of {{ f2 }} bonus magic damage.

Active: Gains {{ e1 }}% Attack Speed for the next {{ e3 }} seconds and automatically grants Strut.
spells.description: Miss Fortune passively increases damage dealt to a target with each strike. This ability can be activated to increase Miss Fortune's Attack Speed and grant her Strut.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Passive: Basic attacks deal {{ f1 }} bonus magic damage, stacking cumulatively up to {{ f3 }} times for a maximum of {{ f2 }} bonus magic damage. Active: Gains {{ e1 }}% Attack Speed for the next {{ e3 }} seconds and automatically grants Strut.
spells.name: Impure Shots
spells.sanitizedDescription: Miss Fortune passively increases damage dealt to a target with each strike. This ability can be activated to increase Miss Fortune's Attack Speed and grant her Strut.

spells.tooltip: Miss Fortune fires hundreds of bullets into the air that rain down at a location after 0.5 seconds, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage over 2 seconds and slowing enemies hit by {{ e2 }}%.
spells.description: Miss Fortune unleashes a flurry of bullets at a location, dealing waves of damage to opponents and slowing them.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Miss Fortune fires hundreds of bullets into the air that rain down at a location after 0.5 seconds, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage over 2 seconds and slowing enemies hit by {{ e2 }}%.
spells.name: Make It Rain
spells.sanitizedDescription: Miss Fortune unleashes a flurry of bullets at a location, dealing waves of damage to opponents and slowing them.

spells.tooltip:
Miss Fortune channels a barrage of bullets into a cone in front of her for 2 seconds, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage and applying a stack of Impure Shots with each bullet ({{ f2 }} additional magic damage for each stack already applied to the target).

Passive: The stack limit for Impure Shots is increased by {{ e2 }}.
spells.description: Miss Fortune channels a flurry of bullets into a cone in front of her, dealing large amounts of damage to enemies.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Miss Fortune channels a barrage of bullets into a cone in front of her for 2 seconds, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage and applying a stack of Impure Shots with each bullet ({{ f2 }} additional magic damage for each stack already applied to the target). Passive: The stack limit for Impure Shots is increased by {{ e2 }}.
spells.name: Bullet Time
spells.sanitizedDescription: Miss Fortune channels a flurry of bullets into a cone in front of her, dealing large amounts of damage to enemies.

passive.name: Strut
passive.description: After 5 seconds of not taking direct damage, Miss Fortune gains an additional 25 Movement Speed. This bonus increases by 8 each second up to a maximum bonus of 70.
passive.sanitizedDescription: After 5 seconds of not taking direct damage, Miss Fortune gains an additional 25 Movement Speed. This bonus increases by 8 each second up to a maximum bonus of 70.
